docs.text: Here's the updated meal plan with chhola (boiled chickpeas) included and papaya removed, as per your request: Updated 7-Day Meal Plan with Chhola (Boiled Chickpeas) and No Papaya Day Meal Food Items Reasoning for Food Choices & Pairing Time Range Day 1 Breakfast Ripe Banana with oats, Chia pudding, Raisins Bananas are rich in potassium and vitamin C, improving iron absorption. Oats and raisins add iron. 8:00 AM - 9:00 AM Mid-Morning Snack Raw Banana Curry (small serving), Carrot sticks Raw banana is rich in iron and prebiotics, aiding iron absorption. Carrots add fiber and antioxidants. 10:30 AM - 11:00 AM Lunch Paneer & Spinach Curry, Brown rice, Steamed broccoli Paneer provides iron and protein, while spinach helps with iron absorption, and broccoli provides vitamin C. 12:30 PM - 1:30 PM Afternoon Snack Boiled Chhola (chickpeas) , Raisins Chickpeas are rich in iron, and raisins help enhance iron absorption due to their vitamin C content. 3:30 PM - 4:30 PM Dinner Soybean Stir-fry with bell peppers, broccoli, Millet roti Soybeans provide protein and iron, while broccoli enhances absorption of iron. Millet roti adds fiber. 7:00 PM - 8:00 PM Evening Snack Herbal tea or lemon water Lemon helps with iron absorption and aids digestion. 9:00 PM - 9:30 PM Day 2 Breakfast Ripe Banana with almond butter on whole wheat toast, Orange juice Banana offers iron and potassium, while almond butter adds healthy fats and protein. Orange juice provides vitamin C. 8:00 AM - 9:00 AM Mid-Morning Snack Raw Banana stir-fry with onions, tomatoes Raw banana provides iron, while tomatoes provide vitamin C to help iron absorption. 10:30 AM - 11:00 AM Lunch Lentil Soup with Paneer & Roasted vegetables (carrots, peas, spinach), Quinoa Lentils are high in iron, and pairing them with paneer adds protein and iron. Spinach and carrots boost vitamin C. 12:30 PM - 1:30 PM Afternoon Snack Boiled Chhola (chickpeas) with lemon, Carrot sticks Chickpeas are rich in iron, and lemon helps improve absorption of iron from plant sources. 3:30 PM - 4:30 PM Dinner Paneer Tikka , Brown rice, Roasted cauliflower Paneer provides iron, and cauliflower adds fiber and antioxidants to help absorption. 7:00 PM - 8:00 PM Evening Snack Herbal tea or lemon water Lemon helps with iron absorption and aids digestion. 9:00 PM - 9:30 PM Day 3 Breakfast Ripe Banana with oats, Raisins, Flaxseeds Ripe banana is rich in iron and helps improve digestion. Raisins and flaxseeds boost iron and omega-3 content. 8:00 AM - 9:00 AM Mid-Morning Snack Raw Banana stir-fry with spices, tomato Raw banana provides iron, and tomato enhances iron absorption due to its vitamin C content. 10:30 AM - 11:00 AM Lunch Chickpea Salad with cucumber, tomatoes, onions, Paneer stir-fry, Whole grain bread Chickpeas and paneer provide iron, and cucumbers and tomatoes help absorb iron effectively. 12:30 PM - 1:30 PM Afternoon Snack Boiled Chhola (chickpeas) , A handful of raisins Chickpeas provide iron, and raisins help enhance iron absorption due to their vitamin C content. 3:30 PM - 4:30 PM Dinner Soybean Stir-fry, Brown rice, Roasted broccoli, Zucchini Soybeans provide protein and iron, while broccoli enhances absorption of iron. Zucchini offers fiber and antioxidants. 7:00 PM - 8:00 PM Evening Snack Herbal tea or lemon water Lemon helps with iron absorption and aids digestion. 9:00 PM - 9:30 PM Day 4 Breakfast Ripe Banana with chia seeds and almonds, Fresh orange juice Bananas are rich in iron and potassium, which aid digestion and iron absorption. Chia seeds provide iron and omega-3s. 8:00 AM - 9:00 AM Mid-Morning Snack Raw Banana curry with coconut and spices Raw banana provides iron, while the coconut adds flavor and fat for absorption. 10:30 AM - 11:00 AM Lunch Lentil stew (moong dal), Brown rice, Roasted sweet potatoes Lentils are high in iron, and sweet potatoes add antioxidants. Brown rice adds fiber. 12:30 PM - 1:30 PM Afternoon Snack Boiled Chhola (chickpeas) , A handful of almonds Chana provides iron, and almonds help with healthy fats and additional iron intake. 3:30 PM - 4:30 PM Dinner Paneer & Spinach stir-fry, Millet roti, Steamed broccoli Paneer provides protein and iron, and broccoli helps with iron absorption. Millet roti is rich in fiber. 7:00 PM - 8:00 PM Evening Snack Herbal tea or lemon water Lemon helps with iron absorption and aids digestion. 9:00 PM - 9:30 PM Day 5 Breakfast Ripe Banana with almonds, Raisins, Flaxseeds, Chia pudding Bananas are rich in iron and potassium, while almonds and raisins help with iron absorption. 8:00 AM - 9:00 AM Mid-Morning Snack Raw Banana stir-fry with onion, tomatoes, and spices Raw banana offers iron, and tomatoes provide vitamin C, which aids absorption. 10:30 AM - 11:00 AM Lunch Soybean curry , Brown rice, Spinach salad Soybeans are rich in protein and iron, and spinach helps improve iron absorption. 12:30 PM - 1:30 PM Afternoon Snack Boiled Chhola (chickpeas) , Raisins Gram (chana) is a rich source of iron, and raisins provide vitamin C, enhancing absorption. 3:30 PM - 4:30 PM Dinner Paneer Tikka, Brown rice, Roasted cauliflower, Mixed vegetables Paneer provides protein and iron, and cauliflower adds antioxidants and fiber. 7:00 PM - 8:00 PM Evening Snack Herbal tea or lemon water Lemon helps with iron absorption and aids digestion. 9:00 PM - 9:30 PM Day 6 Breakfast Ripe Banana with oats, raisins, almonds Bananas provide iron, potassium, and fiber, aiding digestion. Raisins and almonds boost iron absorption. 8:00 AM - 9:00 AM Mid-Morning Snack Raw Banana stir-fry with peas and tomatoes Raw banana contains iron, and tomatoes offer vitamin C to enhance iron absorption. 10:30 AM - 11:00 AM Lunch Lentil soup , Brown rice, Roasted vegetables Lentils and brown rice are rich in iron, while roasted vegetables add fiber and antioxidants. 12:30 PM - 1:30 PM Afternoon Snack Boiled Chhola (chickpeas) , A handful of raisins Raw banana provides iron, and raisins help enhance iron absorption due to their vitamin C content. 3:30 PM - 4:30 PM Dinner Soybean stir-fry, Millet roti, Spinach and carrot salad Soybeans are rich in iron, while spinach and carrots provide essential vitamins and fiber. 7:00 PM - 8:00 PM Evening Snack Herbal tea or lemon water Lemon helps with iron absorption and aids digestion. 9:00 PM - 9:30 PM By replacing papaya with boiled chhola (chickpeas) , you're adding a good source of iron to your meals, which supports better hemoglobin and ferritin levels. Chickpeas also provide protein and are a great source of dietary fiber, helping with digestion and the overall absorption of nutrients like iron.
